tool_description: API to exchange pool geographical data
name: Pools info
title: Pools info

api_list.name: Create Pool
api_list.description: Inserts a new record in the database. Requieres Authorization
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pools-info.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/pools"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pools-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pools-info.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/pools"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pools-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
